item.title: By: Eddie Caldwell
item.dc:creator: Eddie Caldwell
item.description:
Thanks for the great presentation Kevin. Was definitely worth the drive to Atlanta to see your presentation. Really looking forward to seeing the slides or code online.
Eddie
item.content:encoded:
Thanks for the great presentation Kevin. Was definitely worth the drive to Atlanta to see your presentation. Really looking forward to seeing the slides or code online.

Eddie

item.title: By: Joe Reed
item.dc:creator: Joe Reed
item.description:
Kevin,
Great session...thanks for bring it to Atlanta before you retired it. Looking forward to the slides, code and whitepaper.
Have a good one.
-Joe
item.content:encoded:
Kevin,

Great session…thanks for bring it to Atlanta before you retired it. Looking forward to the slides, code and whitepaper.
